name: Black Friday Brawl (nine-ten)
description: Black Friday Brawl (BFB) is a competitive 4 player first person shooter game set within a store. In this game, you and 3 other people are trying their best in order to snag the most deals and spend the most amount of money! Players are encouraged to fight to the death in order to take valuable items such as televisions, refrigerators, and babies by using various weapons also found around the store. The final version of this game will feature a variety of game modes such as team deathmatch and capture the flag.
